description: Lord Woolsack is a cautious and experienced lord who prefers to solve problems diplomatically. He is reluctant to use military means, but when forced to do so, his strategies are always well-considered and targeted.
anger_1: You damned fool, what in God's name do you think you're doing?
anger_2: You damned fool, what in God's name do you think you're doing?
plead: The honorable Lord Woolsack, captured and brutally murdered.
victory_1: We found the crumbling remains of a palisade.
victory_2: We found the crumbling remains of a palisade.
victory_3: We found the crumbling remains of a palisade.
victory_4: We found the crumbling remains of a palisade.
thanks: At least you managed to fulfill your task halfway.
ally_death: The fool set up camp in the midst of a wolf trail.
congrats: Giving you the chance to prove yourselves.
boast: The wolves are mating in the next county.
help: We have nothing to counter an attack.
siege: Find their hiding spots and wipe them out!
no_attack_1: Not even you would be foolish enough to order a frontal assault on De Puce.
no_attack_2: Not even you would be foolish enough to order a frontal assault on De Puce.
no_help_1: No, no! We don't have enough men for a full-blown war.
no_help_2: No, no! We don't have enough men for a full-blown war.
sent: This time you must not fail.
team_losing: You must prevent being discovered at all costs!
help_sent: You will take the first command!
will_attack: Hmm... it seems I have no other choice.
